name: Voting Token (Wrapper)
description: Extension of ERC20 to support Compound-like voting and delegation.

constructorDecorators.name: Constructor
constructorDecorators.description: Deployes the voting token wrapper with given token name and symbol.

parameterDecorators.name: Token name
parameterDecorators.description: Name of the token which will be deployed.

parameterDecorators.name: Token symbol
parameterDecorators.description: Symbol of the token which will be depoyed.

parameterDecorators.name: Wrapped token
parameterDecorators.description: Original token for which the governance is created.

functionDecorators.name: Get checkpoints
functionDecorators.description: Returns the selected checkpoint from the account's historical list of checkpoints. Checkpoints trackt the voting power changes for a given account.

parameterDecorators.name: Account
parameterDecorators.description: Account address to query for the checkpoints history.

parameterDecorators.name: Index
parameterDecorators.description: Selected item from the list of the historical checkpoints for the given account.

returnDecorators.name: Checkpoint
returnDecorators.description: Checkpoint describing account's voting power at a defined point in time

parameters.name: From block
parameters.description: Point in time when the checkpoint was made and the voting power was updated for the account

parameters.name: Votes
parameters.description: Total voting power assigned to the given account since the moment when the checkpoint was created.

functionDecorators.name: Number of checkpoints
functionDecorators.description: Get number of checkpoints for given account. Checkpoints represent historical changes of account's voting power.

parameterDecorators.name: Account
parameterDecorators.description: Account for which the number of checkpoints is queried.

returnDecorators.name: Number of checkpoints
returnDecorators.description: Total number of checkpoints stored for the given account.

functionDecorators.name: Underlying token
functionDecorators.description: Underlying token wrapped inside this governance token.

returnDecorators.name: Underlying token
returnDecorators.description: Token wrapped inside this governance token.
